mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist (prod_qty, member_id, prod_id, wish_id) VALUES (#{prod_qty}, #{member_id}, #{prod_id}, seq_wishlist_id.nextval)
mapper.select: SELECT prod_qty, wish.prod_id, prod_name, prod_price FROM wishlist wish LEFT JOIN product prod ON wish.prod_id = prod.prod_id WHERE wish.member_id = #{member_id}
